frontmatter.title: Chameletones
frontmatter.description: 3D models and landing page for a concept of adaptable headphones

projectData.task: To create a concept of a non-existent product, model it in 3D and pack into a landing to practice modeling

process.title: Coding
process.caption: I decided to teach myself to code and iterated a lot until got something interesting

process.title: Printing
process.caption: After generating 100s of images, I selected 9, printed and framed them

process.title: Exhibition
process.caption: With the venue owner, we mounted the pieces and the installation
